## What is Quarto?

::: columns
::: {.column width="50%"}
![](images/quarto.png){fig-align="center" width="381"}
:::

::: {.column width="50%" style="font-size: 80%"}
-   **Open-source** scientific and technical publishing system.

-   A **multi-language**, next-generation version of R Markdown.

    -   R, Python, Julia, Observable

-   Created using your favorite tools including VS Code, **RStudio**, Jupyter Lab, or any text editor.

-   Used for creating articles, reports, presentations, websites, blogs, and books in HTML, PDF, MS Word, ePub, and more.
:::
